function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Combine self-reported history with medical records and objective tests for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use statistical techniques to analyze and interpret combined response categories, and provide context when reporting the findings.","category":"Analysis and reporting","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct sensitivity analyses to assess the impact of recoding on the results, and clearly communicate the methodology and limitations in research findings.","category":"Analysis and reporting","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use random sampling and ensure diverse participation to reduce bias.","category":"Data collection and sampling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Carefully evaluate and acknowledge the limitations of the data collected during the lockdown period.","category":"Data collection and sampling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use multiple methods of data verification and validation, consult with subject matter experts","category":"Data verification and validation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use multiple testing methods, consider a wider range of variables, consult with statistical experts","category":"Data verification and validation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regularly update and adapt software, explore other statistical software options","category":"Software and technology management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seeking increased funding and investment in biodiversity conservation","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing international funding initiatives and partnerships to address funding gaps","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocating for increased public and private sector investment in biodiversity conservation","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocate for the importance of pcas in public budgets, lobby for continued funding for conservation efforts.","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish regulations and incentives to ensure that private sector investments prioritize public health and safety, in addition to financial returns.","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocating for the retention or increase of pca budgets, implementing cost-effective management strategies, and seeking alternative funding sources","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocacy for increased budget allocation, integration of biodiversity-positive actions into other ministry plans and budgets","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Design job creation programmes to bring about biodiversity benefits, focus on pcas","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of cohesive national development strategies that recognize the importance of biodiversity and ecosystem services","category":"Policy and strategy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of fiscal earmarking to secure and channel public sector funds for pcas","category":"Policy and strategy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocacy for dual funding allocation for both sustainable development/climate change and biodiversity conservation objectives to ensure balanced resource allocation.","category":"Policy and strategy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing alternative financial support mechanisms, creating targeted funding programs for pcas with limited revenue, and advocating for inclusive conservation policies.","category":"Policy and strategy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engaging the finance sector, attracting private capital, and demonstrating the financial viability of conservation projects","category":"Policy and strategy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing the speed and efficiency of bringing biodiversity investment opportunities to market, enhancing business acumen of project developers, reducing transaction costs, and providing blended finance","category":"Policy and strategy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving business acumen of project developers, reducing transaction costs, providing blended finance, and reducing risk for private sector investors","category":"Policy and strategy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulatory oversight, impact assessments, sustainable investment practices, and stakeholder engagement","category":"Regulation and oversight","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regulate and manage activities through policy and oversight","category":"Regulation and oversight","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement social and environmental safeguards for lending institutions","category":"Regulation and oversight","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforce sustainable and legal practices in supply chains","category":"Regulation and oversight","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strategic and integrated approach to improve pca funding","category":"Policy and strategy","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversifier la base de financement, accroître le financement du développement international et la philanthropie","category":"Funding and investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage and incentivize data sharing, enforce legal requirements for data sharing","category":"Data sharing and governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish centralized data sharing mechanisms, incentivize sponsors to share data","category":"Data sharing and governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish clear data sharing protocols and provide resources to support data sharing efforts","category":"Data sharing and governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop a standardized international data governance framework and facilitate cross-border data sharing agreements","category":"Data sharing and governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement open data sharing initiatives and regulations","category":"Data sharing and governance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict reproducibility and transparency standards in clinical research","category":"Research standards and protocols","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Independent verification and validation of research findings, strict peer review processes","category":"Research standards and protocols","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establishing standardized research protocols, independent verification and validation","category":"Research standards and protocols","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing sustainable land use policies, promoting biodiversity conservation, reducing resource extraction, and limiting co2 emissions","category":"Environmental protection and sustainability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continual assessment and adaptation of suppression measures to maintain effectiveness","category":"Pandemic response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures, research for new intervention methods","category":"Pandemic response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct thorough analysis of intervention outcomes within each country and consider specific contextual factors.","category":"Pandemic response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuously monitor and evaluate the impact of interventions, improve data collection and reporting","category":"Pandemic response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting ongoing evaluation of the effectiveness of interventions and adjusting strategies accordingly","category":"Pandemic response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continual assessment of intervention effectiveness and implementation of additional measures as needed","category":"Pandemic response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collect more data over time to reduce uncertainty","category":"Data collection and sampling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Refine the model to incorporate trends in deaths without interventions","category":"Analysis and reporting","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting sensitivity analysis and focusing on the joint impact of interventions","category":"Analysis and reporting","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring of adherence levels, updating forecasting models accordingly","category":"Pandemic response","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct ongoing monitoring and evaluation of interventions, and adapt strategies based on new data and insights.","category":"Pandemic response","confidence":"High"}]}
